text: Želiezovce or Zseliz (; ) is a town in the Levice District in the Nitra Region in Slovakia. It is on the river Hron. About 6,500 people live there. == Twin towns == Želiezovce is twinned with: * Barcs, Hungary * Makó, Hungary * Miercurea Ciuc, Romania * Trstená, Slovakia == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Nitra Region
title: Želiezovce
